title: Taiwan's President says the threat from China is increasing 'every day,' and confirms presence of US troops on the island
content:
1. Taiwan's President says the threat from China is increasing 'every day,' and confirms presence of US troops on the island  CNN
  2. Taiwan has no right to join UN, China says, as US ratchets up tensions  The Guardian
  3. As China-Taiwan Tensions Rise, U.S. Strategy Raises Questions | WSJ  Wall Street Journal
  4. Diplomatic posturing with China matters to Mississippi farmers  Clarion Ledger
  5. Biden should end the confusion and say America will defend Taiwan | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 台湾総統、中国の脅威は「日々高まっている」と述べ、米軍の駐留を確認
台湾总统称来自中国的威胁 "与日俱增"，并确认美军在岛上的存在
臺灣總統稱來自中國的威脅 "與日俱增"，並確認美軍在島上的存在
